text: Ojo in duruƣʙarovardagon dar zamin sajr nakardaand, to ʙingarand, ki oqiʙati kasone, ki pajomʙaronasonro duruƣ ʙarovardand, pes az onho mezistaand, ci guna ʙudaast? Onho mardume, ʙudand, ki nerujason ʙestar va osorason dar rui zamin farovontar ʙud. Pas, on cizho, az ʙinoho, ʙoƣho va kistzorho, ki ʙa dast meovardand, hangomi faro rasidani azoʙ ʙa onho foidae naʙaxsid
